frame.name: Lightweight Frame
frame.description: Superb handling. Move faster with this weapon equipped.

perks.description:
Lightly vented barrel.
  •  Greatly controls recoil
  •  Increases handling speed
perks.name: Arrowhead Brake

perks.description:
Stable barrel attachment.
  •  Increases stability
  •  Moderately controls recoil
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Chambered Compensator

perks.description:
Balanced barrel. 
  •  Slightly increases range and stability
  •  Slightly increases handling speed
perks.name: Corkscrew Rifling

perks.description:
Weighty barrel extension.
  •  Increases range
  •  Decreases handling speed
  •  Moderately controls recoil
perks.name: Extended Barrel

perks.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases stability
perks.name: Fluted Barrel

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for distance.
  •  Greatly increases range
  •  Decreases stability
  •  Slightly decreases handling speed
perks.name: Full Bore

perks.description:
Durable ranged barrel.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Hammer-Forged Rifling

perks.description:
Barrel optimized for recoil reduction.
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Polygonal Rifling

perks.description:
Dual strength barrel.
  •  Increases range
  •  Increases stability
perks.name: Smallbore

perks.description:
This weapon can fire longer distances.
  •  Increases range
perks.name: Accurized Rounds

perks.description:
This weapon's magazine is built for higher capacity.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Appended Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has multiple tactical improvements.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Increases reload speed
  •  Slightly increases magazine size
perks.name: Tactical Mag

perks.description:
This weapon has a greatly increased magazine size, but reloads much slower.
  •  Greatly increases magazine size
  •  Greatly decreases reload speed
perks.name: Extended Mag

perks.description:
This magazine is optimized for recoil control.
  •  Greatly increases stability 
  •  Slightly decreases range
perks.name: Steady Rounds

perks.description: Faster reloads when the magazine is empty.
perks.name: Alloy Magazine

perks.description:
Optimized for fast reloading.
  •  Slightly increases stability
  •  Greatly increases reload speed
perks.name: Flared Magwell

perks.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo automatically loads this weapon beyond normal capacity.
perks.name: Overflow

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Picking up Special or Heavy ammo loads this weapon even further beyond normal capacity.
perks.name: Overflow

perks.description: Using this weapon to break the shield of a combatant or a Guardian using their Super will grant you an overshield for an improved duration.
perks.name: Turnabout

perks.description: Defeating targets partially reloads the magazine from reserves with an increased amount of ammo.
perks.name: Subsistence

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a short duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for a short duration.
perks.name: Sleight of Hand

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion

perks.description: Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
perks.name: Encore

perks.description: Kills provide improved handling for all weapons for a longer duration.
perks.name: Steady Hands

perks.description: Final blows with weapons or abilities while this weapon is stowed increase its handling, stability, and reload speed for an improved duration.
perks.name: Sleight of Hand

perks.description: This weapon gains bonus stability, handling, and reload speed while the wielder is in motion for a short duration.
perks.name: Perpetual Motion Enhanced

perks.description:
Precision final blows grant a stacking range bonus to this weapon. Non-precision final blows remove range stacks but grant bonus accuracy and stability when all range stacks have been removed.
Effect duration is improved.
perks.name: Encore

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for a short duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Killing combatants with this weapon generates a small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Being in combat for an extended time increases damage, handling, and reload for this weapon for an improved duration until you are out of combat.
perks.name: Frenzy

perks.description: Final blows grant increased mobility, weapon range, and handling for an improved duration.
perks.name: Killing Wind

perks.description: Defeating combatants with this weapon generates an improved small amount of Super energy.
perks.name: Thresh

perks.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost.
perks.name: Bait and Switch

perks.description: Kills with this weapon generate grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage from melee kills and kills with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for a short duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Deal damage with all equipped weapons within a short time to give this weapon a damage boost for an improved duration.
perks.name: Bait and Switch

perks.description: Final blows with this weapon generate an improved amount of grenade energy. Activating your grenade ability reloads this weapon from reserves.
perks.name: Demolitionist

perks.description: This weapon gains increased damage for an improved duration from melee final blows and defeating targets with this weapon.
perks.name: Swashbuckler

perks.description: Final blows with other weapons improve this weapon's damage and performance for an improved duration.
perks.name: Harmony

perks.description: Gain health based on the number of hits before reloading.
perks.name: Souldrinker
